about_the_game:
The game is open-world and contains a wealth of explorable content, you will experience a unique journey, discover new spirits, become friends with them and get new information. Defeat new enemies, get special materials and create exclusive equipment. Travel to new locations, complete glorious missions, and become someone to rely on.
NPC conversations contain different choices that will cause things to go in different directions. The day and night system within the game will also allow you to experience different stories at different times.




The game has a highly free equipment system, each set of equipment has unique strengths and weaknesses attributes, obtain them and then build the powerful character you want. You can sacrifice your defense to get high blasts, or you can get super high evasion, but at the cost of taking extra damage. Which character you want to be is entirely up to you.




To defeat the enemy, you need to use some strategy. The game combat has two main mechanisms: Boost and break defense. By accumulating Boost points, you can explode tons of damage in a single turn. Attacking enemies' weaknesses will put them into a broken state, where they become extremely vulnerable, so grab the opportunity to attack. Enemies will also have powerful skills, only at the right time, through the Boost in skills to break the defense of them, to create a ray of hope.



Now the continent of Siana is suffering, under the tyranny of the demons, but also hidden more evil conspiracy, oh brave man, set out! Become a hero under the expectation of all people, or become a demon after seeing the truth.

Suggestions and Reports: wxzlion@163.com

name: Siana Tales

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: ntel Core i7-4790, 3.4 GHz | AMD Ryzen 5 1500X, 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 2 GB | AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790, 3.4 GHz | AMD Ryzen 5 1500X 3.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Conteúdo sexual
Linguagem imprópria
Drogas lícitas

short_description: In this mysterious "Shana continent", there is a tree of life that can transform objects into human-like creatures, called "object spirits". The world is currently under attack by demons from the abyss, and you, as a warrior, are needed to save life. And you will exploring your true identity.
